title: Student Login with Mobile Number and Password

requirements.summary: Add React Query hooks for student password-based authentication
acceptanceCriteria: useStudentLogin mutation calls the backend studentLogin with mobileNumber and password
useStudentRegister mutation calls the backend registerStudent with mobileNumber and password
On successful login, session token and student name are stored via useStudentAuth

file_operations.description: Add useStudentLogin mutation hook that calls actor.studentLogin(mobileNumber, password), returns the session token on success, and handles authentication errors. Add useStudentRegister mutation hook that calls actor.registerStudent(mobileNumber, password) and handles validation errors. Both hooks must use the backend interface methods studentLogin and registerStudent as defined in backend.d.ts.

requirements.summary: Replace OTP-based student login with password-based login and registration forms
acceptanceCriteria: Login form has Mobile Number and Password fields
Register form has Mobile Number, Password, and Confirm Password fields
Password mismatch on registration shows an inline error
Successful login stores session token and redirects to student dashboard
Failed login shows an error message (e.g., 'Invalid mobile number or password')
Form fields are validated (non-empty, mobile number is numeric and 10 digits)

file_operations.description: Replace the existing OTP-based login flow with a dual-mode form supporting Login and Register tabs. For Login mode: render Mobile Number (input type='tel', 10-digit numeric validation) and Password (input type='password') fields with inline error messages. For Register mode: render Mobile Number, Password, and Confirm Password fields with password-match validation. On form submission, call useStudentLogin (Login mode) or useStudentRegister (Register mode) mutation hooks from useQueries.ts. On successful login, store the session token via setStudentAuthToken from useStudentAuth and navigate to /student-dashboard using the onNavigate callback. Display inline error messages for invalid credentials, validation failures, or backend errors. Use shadcn/ui components (Button, Input, Card, Tabs) for consistent styling with the existing design system. Ensure mobile number validation enforces exactly 10 numeric digits.
